org.hibernate.ogm

Interface OgmSessionFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, javax.persistence.EntityManagerFactory, HibernateEntityManagerFactory, Referenceable, Serializable, SessionFactory
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    OgmSessionFactoryImplementor

    public interface OgmSessionFactory
extends SessionFactory
    Provides OGM-specific functionality on the session factory level.
    Author:
    Gunnar Morling

      static interface  OgmSessionFactory.OgmSessionBuilder<T extends OgmSessionFactory.OgmSessionBuilder>
      A SessionBuilder which creates OgmSessions.
